allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys import json content = sys.stdin.read\(\) lines = content.strip\(\).split\(''\\n''\) for line in lines: try: obj = json.loads\(line\) if ''message'' in obj and ''content'' in obj[''message'']: for item in obj[''message''][''content'']: if item.get\(''type''\) == ''text'': text = item.get\(''text'', ''''\) if len\(text\) > 500 and \(''Source'' in text or ''DESI'' in text or ''Eurostat'' in text or ''CEDEFOP'' in text\): print\(''---SECTION---''\) print\(text[:5000]\) print\(\) except: pass ")

Bash(python3 -c " import sys import json content = sys.stdin.read\(\) lines = content.strip\(\).split\(''\\n''\) for line in lines: try: obj = json.loads\(line\) if ''message'' in obj and ''content'' in obj[''message'']: for item in obj[''message''][''content'']: if item.get\(''type''\) == ''tool_use'' and item.get\(''name''\) == ''Write'': inp = item.get\(''input'', {}\) if ''content'' in inp: print\(inp[''content''][:15000]\) except: pass ")
